title: Surasek
text: Lord Surasek, supreme pathfinder of the [[Guiding Path]], guides the nation of [[Riedra]] from the metropolis of [[Durat Tal]] in [[Corvagura]]. As Eidolon of the Sphere of Surasek, he also holds final authority over the governing of nearby [[Dar Myan]] and [[Dul Kalent]]. He is one of only three [[kalaraq]] [[quori]] who spend most of their time in their [[Inspired]] vessels on [[Eberron]] rather than scheming in the [[Region of Dreams|Dal Quor]]; the other two are Lord [[Zoratesh]] and Lady [[Sharadhuna]].
